评论详情: After searching through multiple dresses, this dress was perfect for my engagement pictures. It does come wrinkled but with a steamer they came right out! It was true to size and definitely would recommend! Loved this dress!
I love this dress. Wore it the next day. Lots of compliments
Had to use the steamer to help with wrinkles initially but overall it's a good dress, perfect for baby bump. Excited to wear it for my baby shower.
This dress was perfect for our beach family photos! Length was perfect. I’m 5’4 and the length was great. Fabric is well made and not see through. Comfy, affordable, and can be dressed up as needed.
It is beautiful and fits well.

The color of this dress is spot on to what you see in the photo. However, I bought this by mistake and I returned it.But it seems to look exactly like the photo. As a seller, I would continue selling these dresses because they are hard to find.
Better than expected, super comfy and flattering. Can't wait to wear it to CABO!
I love the fit of the dress, the split is a little higher than I like but the fit is great
Good quality! You can dress up or casual.

评论概述: Sleeve was completely detached from the dress
评论详情: Cute dress, cheap and horribly made.
Comfy, sexy, country. Flows just right. Received lots of compliments! Fit is perfect.

The material is a lovely dark sage color, not at all see through, and is very flowy and light! No concerns of it slipping considering it is a strapless dress. This dress could be worn dressed up with heels and accessories or casually with a pair of flats and a purse! One thing i caution is that the dangle sleeves are not as snug as I personally prefer, which makes the sleeves hang and look large compared to the rest of the dress. Otherwise it is true to size with a properly placed leg slit and a scrunch effect across the waist that hides the pooch nicely (IYKYK)

评论概述: Does not fit well and doesn't have any shape.
评论详情: I had such high hopes for this dress when I bought it for my husband and I to model for a photographer. I ended up buying it in two different sizes and neither size looked good. There wasn't elastic or ties where there should have been to cinch it up and the material felt very thin and not very durable. I ended up returning it before we even did the session.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! The pictures don’t do it justice because I bought it for a water photoshoot that my friend asked me to do, but it was perfect!!! The dress is light and beautiful on, and can be styled casually or formally! I love the slits and the off the shoulders. Super sexy, but also cute. I usually were an XL and so that’s what I order and so it was true to size! Also it’s pretty good quality. I am not sure that I would spend $40 on a dress that I am going to be in water in again, but the dress was definitely worth it. It also cleaned really well after being in the lake for hours.
Great fit, flattering and perfect photos!

I bought this dress very last minute for my mother in law's formal 50th birthday celebration and the delivery was pretty quick. When I reveived it, I was immediately shocked by the quality of the dress and once I tried it on, I fell in love with it even more, it fit like a glove!! For reference, I am 5'8, 265lbs & currently 35wks pregnant, and I got this in a size 2X. This dress would also be great for maternity photo shoot!

I ordered the ivory color, material was thinner than expected not the best quality and was also see through. Size small for reference 5’5”, and 130 lbs. also felt like it was tight at the bust with a bra on

评论概述: Beautiful, excellent material so comfortable so much compliments. Wore it to a wedding in Jamaica

评论用户: this stuff is great! it makes such a perfect gift for any baby shower and is the perfect item for the newest addition to your family!
评论详情: this dress is worth the money! it’s so cute and the perfect dress for couples/family pictures! very stretchy and comfortable

I bought this as a maternity dress option for our photo shoot and was very happy with the results! The fabric was light and not see through unlike other maternity dresses online. The fit was just right, and easy to wash afterwards. This is a great option for a maternity dress or otherwise!
I loved this dress so much! I’m going to order it in another color! It does wrinkle very easily so just prepare for that but it’s gorgeous!

I never write a review, But this dress exceeded my expectations!! I ordered three different colors and discovered that they come in different types of fabrics, which explains the difference on the price . The green color, which is the one I loved the most, has perfect fabric and quality, it is a keeper. I super recommend.
Still wrinkled after drying, but overall cute.

I’m 5’2 174lbs a DD and the M size fit perfectly! The flow of the dress is beautiful. You wear dress it down or up and it will still me amazing. Used it for family photos on the beach. I want one in every color now!

Loved this dress. Not maternity but fit so well for maternity photos (except it makes the split SUPER high bc of baby bump, so be mindful!). It comes out of the package very wrinkled, but nothing a good steam can’t fix. The color is gorgeous. Couldn’t be happier for the look I was going for. In these photos I’m 8 months preggers, 5’8”.
Used for maternity pictures. The top can bunch a bit funky but the color was beautiful.
I loved it and got lots of compliments.

I bought this dress to wear for my baby shower and maternity pics. I didn’t end up wearing it for maternity pics, but I really wish I would have.  It is truly beautiful and so flattering on that I think it would be flattering on anybody type. 10/10
Slightly runs big but was absolutely perfect for my maternity photos

I almost returned this dress because the slip was so short. I was worried that you'd be able to see it with the sun shining through the rest of the dress. LOVE!!!!!! E-X-T-R-E-M-E-L-Y FLATTERING!! The fabric is lightweight and the style of the dress makes it look very loose everywhere, it gathers around the waist, and has a slit that comes up to your thigh, the long dress is slightly flowy but the amount of fabric hangs pretty straight so the leg slit only opens when you want it to. I promise you won’t walk around with your bits out! Love the off-shoulder feature and long puffy sleeves. I will be ordering this dress in other colors for different occasions! Just get it, you won’t regret it.
Used this for my maternity photos the color is everything & it fits in all the right places
Comfortable and cute. True to size
This dress is so beautiful! I wore it to the farm and I got so many compliments. It’s also really comfortable.
Dress fit perfectly! Great light weight fabric . Wonderful for family pics or really any event!

评论概述: Good basic dress for different occasions
评论详情: I'm 5'1 and 150 lbs, fit perfectly, hid my pooch and arms, but emphasized my chest and was flattering with the high waist and slit. Material is thin and wrinkled easily, so bring an iron if you are traveling. The dress is basic so with the right accesories you can dress for different occasions. I've worn it to two weddings (back yard and ballroom settings).

Looks cheap, had a weird fishy smell coming from it. Does not look flattering at all especially not for 60$ I'm 5'2 160lbs ....got a Large thinking it would be stretchy, and it was but didn't look good
I ordered this dress for a waterfall photo shoot and it really was perfect. It’s a fun, romantic  summer kind of dress. It fit comfortably and wasn’t terribly see through. True to size

Loved this dress for my maternity pictures! I ordered my regular size (medium) and it fit great aside from the bust which was quite roomy. Even though this isn’t a maternity dress, it was very bump friendly, it just made the slit a bit higher. Definitely wouldn’t have been comfortable in public with this high of a slit but it was just fine for private photos.
perfect for maternity pics!!!
Like dress.  Kinda hard to get wrinkles out. Lots of compliments. Has pockets!  Needs a belt.

Lined on the bottom so NOT see through However the bust area is not so you may need to wear some sort of nip covers if you care about that. I felt very comfortable and felt it’s flattering in the tummy and hips.
Poorly made

评论概述: Flattering and Comfortable Boho Maxi Dress for Every Occasion
评论详情: From my wife:  This dress is a stunning addition to my wardrobe. From the moment I tried it on, I was impressed by how flattering and comfortable it is. The off-shoulder design adds a touch of elegance and sexiness, while the smocked high waist helps define the figure without feeling too tight. The tiered flowy design gives the dress a light, breezy feel, perfect for warmer days or evening events.  The side slit is a great feature, offering a bit of leg exposure without being too daring. It’s a perfect balance of sexy and sophisticated. The fabric feels soft, breathable, and doesn’t cling to the body, making it super comfortable to wear for long periods. I wore it to a summer wedding, and it was a hit! The flowy silhouette gives it a relaxed, yet polished vibe.  Pros: • The off-shoulder design adds a trendy, flattering touch • Smocked high waist enhances the figure while remaining comfortable • Side slit provides just the right amount of leg exposure without being too revealing • Light, breathable fabric perfect for warm weather • Flowy, tiered design is both stylish and comfortable • Versatile enough for casual or formal occasions, like weddings or beach outings  Cons: • The sizing runs a bit large, so I’d recommend sizing down if you’re in between sizes • The sleeves are long, so they may feel a bit too much if you’re wearing it in hotter weather • The fabric is light, so it may wrinkle easily, keep a steamer on hand for touch-ups  Overall, I’m really pleased with this dress. It’s not only stylish and comfortable but also versatile for different occasions. If you’re looking for a boho chic look that makes you feel confident and comfortable, this dress is definitely worth the investment.

Maybe it's just the white version, but I would recommend looking elsewhere.

Wore this dress for our engagement shots. The dress was very flowy and felt magical to be in! The color matched the picture. Loved the quality and the sleeves stay in place. This dress is so beautiful and comfortable . I wore it during my pregnancy and after.

Wore this to a late October outdoor wedding in Texas - light/thin enough material that I wasn’t overheated in the 70s-80s weather but enough coverage to keep me from being chilly after the sun set. Color was exactly as pictured and fit was flattering and true to size with additional stretch in the waist. Only critique is that the material wrinkles easily so I had to steam it after I laundered it and before I put it on. Dress was long enough (I’m 5’9” - 34”-36” inseam) to wear with boots and didn’t look too short.

This dress was ordered a size up from what I usually wear because I was pregnant and it fit nicely. It was used during a photoshoot and honestly I could not have asked for a better dress for maternity pictures. The material is nice and does not bother it's thin so it is perfect for summer as well.

This is the pale yellow dress which is definitely yellow and not beige but still beautiful. I had to iron it out which was a bit of a PITA but doable. I used it for family photos and wore it with gold hoops, a simple doubled necklace, and Vionic strappy-ish heeled sandals. This is a size small. I weigh 130ish and am 5’4”. I normally wear mediums but fit between smalls to xls because women’s sizing sucks horrible and is incredibly inconsistent.
Just like the photos. Fits as expected. Lightweight but not sheer. It washed up beautifully and wrinkle free. Absolutely love it  I’m 5’5, about 160 lbs and the medium was perfect

I purchased this dress for two reasons. One because I was going to a Halloween costume party and I needed to dress like Jenny from Forrest Gump. Secondly, I wanted something that I would be able to wear again and again and again. This is that dress. It is extremely well-made, soft and comfortable. I am 5 foot 5 1/2 height, 135 lbs and purchased a size medium. The dress fits perfect and hits right below my ankle, which is exactly exactly where I wanted it to be. I can pair this with wedges or flats and it be the perfect length. I highly recommend and I would actually purchase more in different colors.

Beautiful dress!! Great quality! I bought this for fall family pictures, because my photographer recommended wearing a maxi dresss. However when I took it out of the package it was very wrinkly on the bottom half due to packaging. I didn’t have a garment steamer, so I couldn’t get the wrinkles out. I was so sad cause this dress was gorgeous! Totally would recommend if you have a steamer or can get it steamed! I ordered a size small in the color Rust.

I was in need of a dress for a fall wedding and so I got this one last minute and it was amazing!  The fit was perfect and got lots of compliments.  I am 5ft and 156 lbs and got a medium. I plan to buy more in other colors.

Dress itself is very flattering. I am a large in tops, big arms, and XL in bottoms and ordered the large. It fit great and was a little snug on my upper arms but tolerable. I am sadly returning it because the color was more blue in person and didn't coordinate well with my family's outfits for pictures.

This dress is a very nice color. It looks just as pictured. I used it for family photos and it was perfect. Taking away one star because the material is very thin and wrinkles easily. I figured it would be like that, but the dress served it's purpose for photos. Make sure you have a steamer or iron because it will arrive very wrinkled!

Got this dress for our small beach wedding. I'm 5'9 235 lb and the XXL fit beautifully. Nice waistline shows off your hourglass without hugging anything in an unflattering way. Very flowy and feminine. I wish the lining went all the way down but that's pretty minor. I love this dress!

This dress is pretty gorgeous. I simply tried it on... It will need steamed for the wrinkles even after washing and drying on low heat. I got a medium which looked sooo small when I opened the package, but it fit!!! The color is a vivid red!! I wouldn't pay for price for the dress...it's not that exquisite...I did buy it like 40% off I think. Can't wait to have somewhere to wear it!!!
